# ns_private_app_tag (Resource)

PrivateAppTag Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ns_private_app_tag" "my_privateapptag" {
  ids = [
    "...",
  ]
  tag_id = 3
  tags = [
    {
      tag_name = "...my_tag_name..."
    },
  ]
}
```
